flavorText: "Be thankful I left you your clothes."

foreignData.flavorText: "Ringrazia che ti abbia lasciato i vestiti."

name: Disarm
originalText: Unattach all Equipment from target creature.

rulings.text: The Equipment remains on the battlefield under its controller’s control, but is no longer attached to that creature.

text: Unattach all Equipment from target creature.
